hero.title: UX/UI Lead & Frontend Developer
hero.description: I'm a UX/UI specialist and frontend developer crafting intuitive, accessible, and visually engaging digital products.

aboutTeaser.description: Here's a little insight into the person behind the pixels.
aboutTeaser.birthPlace: Born in a small town in southern C√≥rdoba, Argentina
aboutTeaser.birthDescription: I've always carried big dreams and a deep passion for great design and technology.

design.title: Design
design.description: Creating beautiful and functional user interfaces

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Building responsive and performant web applications

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Essential tools for development and design workflow

services.title: What I Do
services.description: A combination of design thinking, solid development, and team experience.

uxui.title: UX/UI Design
uxui.description: From early-stage wireframes to polished prototypes, I design user interfaces that are both intuitive and scalable. I combine design thinking with user research, accessibility standards, and usability testing to ensure every experience delivers real impact.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: I build high-performing, responsive, and accessible web apps using React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript. My toolkit also includes WordPress, Bootstrap, and .NET Core for cases where flexibility or backend integration is key.

teamLeadership.title: Team Leadership
teamLeadership.description: I lead design and dev teams through planning, code reviews, mentoring, and task coordination. I bridge gaps between designers, developers, and stakeholders to align vision, timelines, and deliverables. Clear communication and a user-first mindset are always my priority.

optimization.title: Optimization & Deploy
optimization.description: I handle SEO optimization, site performance enhancements, version control with Git, and streamlined CI/CD workflows. From semantic HTML to asset optimization and production deploys, I ensure that every project is fast, discoverable, and future-proof.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate UX/UI designer and frontend developer.
about.paragraph1: I'm Francisco Sixto ‚Äî a UX/UI designer with a solid technical background. I work at the intersection of design and front-end development, creating digital experiences that are clear, efficient, and user-focused. I believe in good systems, smart iteration, and practical tools that help ship quality without overcomplicating things.
about.paragraph2: Over the years, I've led design and development teams, coordinated priorities, reviewed code and mockups, and built scalable solutions across websites, CRMs, and portals. I enjoy mentoring others, improving team workflows, and balancing creativity with clarity in every step of the process.
about.paragraph3: What drives me is the pursuit of intuitive experiences ‚Äî the kind where structure, interaction, and aesthetics align naturally. Whether I'm working in Figma, VS Code, or in a team call, I'm always thinking about how to make things work better, feel smoother, and serve users with purpose.
about.paragraph4: Outside of work, I'm into sports, spending time with my family and friends, and enjoying simple moments offline. I find a lot of inspiration in everyday life ‚Äî conversations, shared meals, or just being present with the people I care about.
about.thankYou: Thank you for visiting my portfolio! I look forward to the opportunity to collaborate and create something amazing.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here you can find some of the projects I have worked on.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Let's talk!
contact.getInTouchDescription: Have a question or want to work together?

cta.title: Let's build something great together
cta.description: Whether you're looking for a UX/UI designer, a frontend developer, or a team leader to bring your ideas to life ‚Äî I'm ready to jump in. Feel free to reach out, I'd be happy to connect.

subscribe.title: Stay Updated
subscribe.description: Subscribe to my newsletter for the latest updates on projects and industry insights.

officina-artis.title: Officina Artis: A Virtual 3D Art Gallery Exploring Space, Interaction, and Curation
officina-artis.description: I designed and developed a 3D immersive experience to explore artworks in a virtual gallery, combining creative coding, spatial storytelling, and artistic direction.

experience-at-startu.title: Transforming Education Online: UX Strategy and Scalable Design for 20+ University Sites
experience-at-startu.description: I led the design and development of digital experiences across multiple markets, combining strategy, technology, and teamwork to transform over 20 educational websites and boost usability and conversion.

experience-at-autocity.title: From Engines to Elegance: Digital Ecosystems for Automotive, Hospitality, and Lifestyle Brands
experience-at-autocity.description: I designed and developed immersive, high-conversion websites across multiple industries‚Äîfrom automotive platforms with advanced features to high-end hospitality and golf club digital experiences.

experience-at-sixto-van-garret.title: Crafting Bespoke Digital Identities: Custom Web Solutions for Unique Brands
experience-at-sixto-van-garret.description: I created tailored digital experiences for distinctive brands, from luxury services to innovative startups, focusing on custom design and strategic user experience.

experience-at-deep-creek.title: Strategic Digital Transformation: Full-Cycle Development for Enterprise Solutions
experience-at-deep-creek.description: I led comprehensive digital projects from conception to deployment, delivering scalable enterprise solutions with focus on user experience and business objectives.

experience-at-red-sanitaria.title: Healthcare Innovation: Designing Accessible Digital Solutions for Medical Networks
experience-at-red-sanitaria.description: I developed user-centered digital platforms for healthcare providers, prioritizing accessibility, trust, and seamless patient-provider communication.

experience-at-apex.title: Performance-Driven Digital Solutions: High-Impact Projects for Growth-Focused Companies
experience-at-apex.description: I delivered cutting-edge digital experiences optimized for conversion and growth, combining strategic thinking with technical excellence.
